verses.verse: And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did <WH6213> <WH8799> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>: and the YY <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> them into the hand <WH3027> of Midian <WH4080> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>.

And the hand <WH3027> of Midian <WH4080> prevailed <WH5810> <WH8799> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and because <WH6440> of the Midianites <WH4080> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> made <WH6213> <WH8804> them the dens <WH4492> which are in the mountains <WH2022>, and caves <WH4631>, and strong holds <WH4679>.

And so it was, when Yisra'EL <WH3478> had sown <WH2232> <WH8804>, that the Midianites <WH4080> came up <WH5927> <WH8804>, and the Amalekites <WH6002>, and the children <WH1121> of the east <WH6924>, even they came up <WH5927> <WH8804> against them;

And they encamped <WH2583> <WH8799> against them, and destroyed <WH7843> <WH8686> the increase <WH2981> of the earth <WH776>, till thou come <WH935> <WH8800> unto Gaza <WH5804>, and left <WH7604> <WH8686> no sustenance <WH4241> for Yisra'EL <WH3478>, neither sheep <WH7716>, nor ox <WH7794>, nor ass <WH2543>.

For they came up <WH5927> <WH8799> with their cattle <WH4735> and their tents <WH168>, and they came <WH935> <WH8804> <WH8675> <WH935> <WH8799> as <WH1767> grasshoppers <WH697> for multitude <WH7230>; for both they and their camels <WH1581> were without number <WH4557>: and they entered <WH935> <WH8799> into the land <WH776> to destroy <WH7843> <WH8763> it.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> was greatly <WH3966> impoverished <WH1809> <WH8735> because <WH6440> of the Midianites <WH4080>; and the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> cried <WH2199> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>.
And it came to pass, when the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> cried <WH2199> <WH8804> unto the YY <WH3068> because <WH182> of the Midianites <WH4080>,

That the YY <WH3068> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> a prophet <WH376> <WH5030> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, I brought you up <WH5927> <WH8689> from Egypt <WH4714>, and brought you forth <WH3318> <WH8686> out of the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>;

And I delivered <WH5337> <WH8686> you out of the hand <WH3027> of the Egyptians <WH4714>, and out of the hand <WH3027> of all that oppressed <WH3905> <WH8801> you, and drave them out <WH1644> <WH8762> from before <WH6440> you, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> you their land <WH776>;

And I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto you, I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>; fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not the 'elohim <WH430> of the Amorites <WH567>, in whose land <WH776> ye dwell <WH3427> <WH8802>: but ye have not obeyed <WH8085> <WH8804> my voice <WH6963>.

And there came <WH935> <WH8799> an angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068>, and sat <WH3427> <WH8799> under an oak <WH424> which was in Ophrah <WH6084>, that pertained unto Yo'ash <WH3101> the Abiezrite <WH33>: and his son <WH1121> Gid`on <WH1439> threshed <WH2251> <WH8802> wheat <WH2406> by the winepress <WH1660>, to hide <WH5127> <WH8687> it from <WH6440> the Midianites <WH4080>.
And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> unto him, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, The YY <WH3068> is with thee, thou mighty <WH1368> man of valour <WH2428>.

And Gid`on <WH1439> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Oh <WH994> my YY <WH113>, if <WH3426> the YY <WH3068> be with us, why then is all this befallen <WH4672> <WH8804> us? and where be all his miracles <WH6381> <WH8737> which our fathers <WH1> told <WH5608> <WH8765> us of, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Did not the YY <WH3068> bring us up <WH5927> <WH8689> from Egypt <WH4714>? but now the YY <WH3068> hath forsaken <WH5203> <WH8804> us, and delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> us into the hands <WH3709> of the Midianites <WH4080>.

And the YY <WH3068> looked <WH6437> <WH8799> upon him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798> in this thy might <WH3581>, and thou shalt save <WH3467> <WH8689> Yisra'EL <WH3478> from the hand <WH3709> of the Midianites <WH4080>: have not I sent <WH7971> <WH8804> thee?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Oh <WH994> my YY <WH136>, wherewith <WH4100> shall I save <WH3467> <WH8686> Yisra'EL <WH3478>? behold, my family <WH504> <WH8676> <WH505> is poor <WH1800> in M'nasheh <WH4519>, and I am the least <WH6810> in my father's <WH1> house <WH1004>.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Surely I will be with thee, and thou shalt smite <WH5221> <WH8689> the Midianites <WH4080> as one <WH259> man <WH376>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, If now I have found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>, then shew <WH6213> <WH8804> me a sign <WH226> that thou talkest <WH1696> <WH8764> with me.

Depart <WH4185> <WH8799> not hence, I pray thee, until I come <WH935> <WH8800> unto thee, and bring forth <WH3318> <WH8689> my present <WH4503>, and set <WH3240> <WH8689> it before <WH6440> thee. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will tarry <WH3427> <WH8799> until thou come again <WH7725> <WH8800>.

And Gid`on <WH1439> went in <WH935> <WH8804>, and made ready <WH6213> <WH8799> a kid <WH5795> <WH1423>, and unleavened cakes <WH4682> of an ephah <WH374> of flour <WH7058>: the flesh <WH1320> he put <WH7760> <WH8804> in a basket <WH5536>, and he put <WH7760> <WH8804> the broth <WH4839> in a pot <WH6517>, and brought it out <WH3318> <WH8686> unto him under the oak <WH424>, and presented <WH5066> <WH8686> it.

And the angel <WH4397> of 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> the flesh <WH1320> and the unleavened cakes <WH4682>, and lay <WH3240> <WH8685> them upon this <WH1975> rock <WH5553>, and pour out <WH8210> <WH8798> the broth <WH4839>. And he did <WH6213> <WH8799> so.

Then the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> put forth <WH7971> <WH8799> the end <WH7097> of the staff <WH4938> that was in his hand <WH3027>, and touched <WH5060> <WH8799> the flesh <WH1320> and the unleavened cakes <WH4682>; and there rose up <WH5927> <WH8799> fire <WH784> out of the rock <WH6697>, and consumed <WH398> <WH8799> the flesh <WH1320> and the unleavened cakes <WH4682>. Then the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> departed <WH1980> <WH8804> out of his sight <WH5869>.

And when Gid`on <WH1439> perceived <WH7200> <WH8799> that he was an angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068>, Gid`on <WH1439> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Alas <WH162>, O YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> ! for because <WH3651> I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> an angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> face <WH6440> to face <WH6440>.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Peace <WH7965> be unto thee; fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not: thou shalt not die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

Then Gid`on <WH1439> built <WH1129> <WH8799> an altar <WH4196> there unto the YY <WH3068>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> it Jehovahshalom <WH3073>: unto this day <WH3117> it is yet in Ophrah <WH6084> of the Abiezrites <WH33>.

And it came to pass the same night <WH3915>, that the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> thy father's <WH1> young <WH6499> bullock <WH7794>, even the second <WH8145> bullock <WH6499> of seven <WH7651> years old <WH8141>, and throw down <WH2040> <WH8804> the altar <WH4196> of Baal <WH1168> that thy father <WH1> hath, and cut down <WH3772> <WH8799> the grove <WH842> that is by it:

And build <WH1129> <WH8804> an altar <WH4196> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> upon the top <WH7218> of this rock <WH4581>, in the ordered place <WH4634>, and take <WH3947> <WH8804> the second <WH8145> bullock <WH6499>, and offer <WH5927> <WH8689> a burnt sacrifice <WH5930> with the wood <WH6086> of the grove <WH842> which thou shalt cut down <WH3772> <WH8799>.

Then Gid`on <WH1439> took <WH3947> <WH8799> ten <WH6235> men <WH582> of his servants <WH5650>, and did <WH6213> <WH8799> as the YY <WH3068> had said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto him: and so it was, because he feared <WH3372> <WH8804> his father's <WH1> household <WH1004>, and the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892>, that he could not do <WH6213> <WH8800> it by day <WH3119>, that he did <WH6213> <WH8799> it by night <WH3915>.

And when the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892> arose early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242>, behold, the altar <WH4196> of Baal <WH1168> was cast down <WH5422> <WH8795>, and the grove <WH842> was cut down <WH3772> <WH8795> that was by it, and the second <WH8145> bullock <WH6499> was offered <WH5927> <WH8717> upon the altar <WH4196> that was built <WH1129> <WH8803>.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> one <WH376> to another <WH7453>, Who hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> this thing <WH1697>? And when they enquired <WH1875> <WH8799> and asked <WH1245> <WH8762>, they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Gid`on <WH1439> the son <WH1121> of Yo'ash <WH3101> hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> this thing <WH1697>.

Then the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yo'ash <WH3101>, Bring out <WH3318> <WH8685> thy son <WH1121>, that he may die <WH4191> <WH8799>: because he hath cast down <WH5422> <WH8804> the altar <WH4196> of Baal <WH1168>, and because he hath cut down <WH3772> <WH8804> the grove <WH842> that was by it.

And Yo'ash <WH3101> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto all that stood <WH5975> <WH8804> against him, Will ye plead <WH7378> <WH8799> for Baal <WH1168>? will ye save <WH3467> <WH8686> him? he that will plead <WH7378> <WH8799> for him, let him be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714> whilst it is yet morning <WH1242>: if he be a god <WH430>, let him plead <WH7378> <WH8799> for himself, because one hath cast down <WH5422> <WH8804> his altar <WH4196>.

Therefore on that day <WH3117> he called <WH7121> <WH8799> him Yeruba`al <WH3378>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Let Baal <WH1168> plead <WH7378> <WH8799> against him, because he hath thrown down <WH5422> <WH8804> his altar <WH4196>.

Then all the Midianites <WH4080> and the Amalekites <WH6002> and the children <WH1121> of the east <WH6924> were gathered <WH622> <WH8738> together <WH3162>, and went over <WH5674> <WH8799>, and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> in the valley <WH6010> of Yizre`el <WH3157>.

But the Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH3068> came <WH3847> <WH8804> upon Gid`on <WH1439>, and he blew <WH8628> <WH8799> a shofar <WH7782>; and Abiezer <WH44> was gathered <WH2199> <WH8735> after <WH310> him.

And he sent <WH7971> <WH8804> messengers <WH4397> throughout all M'nasheh <WH4519>; who also was gathered <WH2199> <WH8735> after <WH310> him: and he sent <WH7971> <WH8804> messengers <WH4397> unto Asher <WH836>, and unto Z'vulun <WH2074>, and unto Naftali <WH5321>; and they came up <WH5927> <WH8799> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> them.
And Gid`on <WH1439> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH430>, If thou wilt <WH3426> save <WH3467> <WH8688> Yisra'EL <WH3478> by mine hand <WH3027>, as thou hast said <WH1696> <WH8765>,

Behold, I will put <WH3322> <WH8688> a fleece <WH1492> of wool <WH6785> in the floor <WH1637>; and if the dew <WH2919> be on the fleece <WH1492> only, and it be dry <WH2721> upon all the earth <WH776> beside, then shall I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that thou wilt save <WH3467> <WH8686> Yisra'EL <WH3478> by mine hand <WH3027>, as thou hast said <WH1696> <WH8765>.

And it was so: for he rose up early <WH7925> <WH8686> on the morrow <WH4283>, and thrust <WH2115> the fleece <WH1492> together <WH2115> <WH8799>, and wringed <WH4680> <WH8799> the dew <WH2919> out of the fleece <WH1492>, a bowl <WH5602> full <WH4393> of water <WH4325>.

And Gid`on <WH1439> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH430>, Let not thine anger <WH639> be hot <WH2734> <WH8799> against me, and I will speak <WH1696> <WH8762> but this once <WH6471>: let me prove <WH5254> <WH8762>, I pray thee, but this once <WH6471> with the fleece <WH1492>; let it now be dry <WH2721> only upon the fleece <WH1492>, and upon all the ground <WH776> let there be dew <WH2919>.
And 'Elohim <WH430> did <WH6213> <WH8799> so that night <WH3915>: for it was dry <WH2721> upon the fleece <WH1492> only, and there was dew <WH2919> on all the ground <WH776>.
